data.title: Supported acquirers | Online payments
data.meta_description: Check the availability of an acquirer and the functionalities that are available:
data.text:
Supported acquirers

Below is a list of supported acquirers and features for major card brands, gift cards, and Advanced Payment Methods (APMs).

In the Production environment, the settlement will take place according to a fixed scheduled time per acquirer (usually this happens at the end of the day). Check the contract with your acquirer for settlement period details.

Global

AMEX

SandboxProduction

Countries / Regions: Global

Supported Processing Currencies: EUR, GBP, USD, MXN, DKK, AUD, NZD, NOK, SEK, CAD, CHF, CZK, HKD, HUF, PLN, SGD, BMD, BSD, CNY, COP, ILS, INR, ISK, KES,MAD, MYR, RUB, SAR, THB, TRY, TTD, TWD, UAH, EGP, NGN, PHP, HRK, LKR, CRC, ZAR, AED, BBD, PAB, QAR, RON, BND, PKR, BGN, MUR, GHS

Card Brands: American Express

Wallets Supported: Apple Pay, Google Pay

Features: Account Verification (0 Value), CVV Check, Address Verification Services, Pay with Points (US only)

3-D Secure Support: EMV v2.1.0

Stored Credentials Support: Recurring (MIT), Cardholder Initiated Transactions (CIT), Unscheduled CoF (MIT)

Channels: eCommerce, Terminal, Mail Order, Telephone Order

Transaction Actions: Pre-Authorization, Authorization, Full Capture (one-off), Void, Refund

EMEA

Verifone Acquiring

SandboxProduction

Countries / Regions: Europe

Supported Processing Currencies: EUR, USD, CZK, RON, DKK, CHF, NOK, SEK, PLN, GBP

Card Brands: Visa, Mastercard, Maestro

Wallets Supported: Google Pay, Vipps, MobilePay

APMs Supported: Klarna

Features: Account Verification (0 Value), CVV Check

3-D Secure Support: EMV v2.1.0

Stored Credentials Support: Cardholder Initiated Transactions (CIT), Unscheduled CoF (MIT)

Channels: eCommerce, Terminal, Mail Order, Telephone Order

Transaction Actions: Pre-Authorization, Authorization, Full Capture (one-off), Void, Refund

Omnichannel support: Yes (Sandbox and Production)

Elavon

SandboxProduction

Countries / Regions: Europe

Supported Processing Currencies: NOK, USD, EUR, CHF, GBP

Card Brands: American Express, Visa, Mastercard, Maestro, Discover, Diners Club

3-D Secure Support: EMV v2.1.0

Stored Credentials Support: Cardholder Initiated Transactions (CIT), Recurring (MIT), Unscheduled CoF (MIT)

Channels: eCommerce, Mail Order, Telephone Order

Transaction Actions: Pre-Authorization, Authorization, Full Capture (one-off), Void, Refund

SandboxProduction

Countries / Regions: France

Acquiring Connections: Crédit Agricole, Trêsor Public, Banque Populaire, Caise d'Epargne, BNPP, CIC, Crédit Mutuel, Société Générale, LCL, Crédit du Nord, HSBC, La Banque Postale, ARKEA, Banque Palatine, BAMI, Neuflize, Martin Maurel

Supported Processing Currencies: EUR, USD, JPY, XPF, ISK, IQD, CLF, ERN, GBP, SLL, INR, OMR, MOP, PHP, AED, FKP, GHS, AMD, JMD, HUF, DOP, KYD, XCD, NZD

Card Brands: Cartes Bancaires, Visa, Mastercard, Maestro

Features: Account Verification (0 Value), CVV Check

3-D Secure Support: EMV v2.1.0

Channels: eCommerce

Transaction Actions: Pre-Authorization, Authorization, voidCapture, Full Capture (one-off), Refund

SandboxProduction

Card Brands: Visa, Mastercard, Maestro, American Express, Diners Club

3-D Secure Support: EMV v2.1.0

Stored Credentials Support: Cardholder Initiated Transactions (CIT), Recurring (MIT), Unscheduled CoF (MIT)

Channels: eCommerce, Terminal

Transaction Actions: Authorization, voidAuthorization, Full Capture (one-off), voidCapture, Refund

Swedbank

SandboxProduction

Countries / Regions: Norway, Sweden, Finland, Denmark

Supported Processing Currencies: EUR, SEK, NOK, DKK

Card Brands: Visa, Mastercard, Maestro

Features: Account Verification (0 Value), CVV Check

3-D Secure Support: EMV v2.1.0

Stored Credentials Support (only available in Sandbox): Recurring (MIT), Unscheduled CoF (MIT)

Channels: eCommerce, Mail Order, Telephone Order

Transaction Actions: Authorization, Pre-Authorization, Full void Authorization/Pre-Authorization, Full Capture, Partial Capture, voidCapture, Refund, Sale

Omnichannel support: Yes (Sandbox)

Landsbankinn

SandboxProduction

Countries / Regions: Iceland

Supported Processing Currencies: ISK

Card Brands: Visa, Mastercard, Maestro

Wallets Supported: Google Pay

Features: Account Verification (0 Value), CVV Check

3-D Secure Support: EMV v2.1.0

Stored Credentials Support (only available in Sandbox): Recurring (MIT), Unscheduled CoF (MIT)

Channels: eCommerce, In-App, Terminal, Mail Order, Telephone Order

Transaction Actions: Authorization, Pre-Authorization, voidAuthorization, Full Capture, voidCapture, Refund

Lloyds

SandboxProduction

Countries / Regions: UK, Ireland

Supported Processing Currencies: GBP

Card Brands: Visa, Mastercard, Maestro

Features: Account Verification (0 Value), CVV Check, Address Verification Services

3-D Secure Support: EMV v2.1.0

Stored Credentials Support: Cardholder Initiated Transactions (CIT), Recurring (MIT), Unscheduled CoF (MIT)

Scheme Reference Support*: Yes

Channels: eCommerce, Mail Order, Telephone Order

Transaction Actions: Authorization, Pre-Authorization, voidAuthorization, Full Capture (one-off), voidCapture, Refund

Omnichannel support: Yes (Sandbox and Production)

*Scheme Reference: It is sent by the acquirer in the authorization response message, and sent in subsequent authorization request messages associated with the same transaction, e.g. incremental authorizations. The value returned shall also subsequently be included in the settlement data required for the authorization (or authorizations). The Scheme reference data therefore allows the card issuer to match settlement data to the associated authorization message(s).
